Literature.Title: Androsamide, a Cyclic Tetrapeptide from a Marine Nocardiopsis sp., Suppresses Motility of Colorectal Cancer Cells.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human colon adenocarcinoma Caco-2(IC50=13µM),Human gastric adenocarcinoma AGS(IC50=18µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(IC50=21µM)
